messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

cannot create folder sent thursday february cannot create folder hi can you please investigate reason for cannot create folder here exactly what doing click click add folder button enter frankfurt text window click save nothing happens window remain active can only close by clicking cancel asked colleague give try but same happens using his pc best regards senior engineer
